Text: Thnx for this, but jeebzus why rar up 1.5 gig? Takes an hr just to unrar it.
Yeah at the risk of sounding ungrateful, I have to say I hate these freaking multi-part RAR's just a pain in the ass!

Yeah, I don't even download sceneline's files anymore.  If I want to watch the show, and keep a copy to reseed (like you're supposed to), I'd have to give up 3GB of space instead of just 1.5GB.  Makes no sense whatsoever.
